about_the_game: Includes 7 digital artworks (4K), 12 digital artworks (FHD). Digital artworks are not sold separately and are included in Collector's Bundle.
detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!


About the Game

Includes 7 digital artworks (4K), 12 digital artworks (FHD). Digital artworks are not sold separately and are included in Collector's Bundle.

name: Tetragon - HD Wallpapers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz (Single Core) or 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 8 MB available space

short_description: Includes 7 digital artworks (4K), 12 digital artworks (FHD). Digital artworks are not sold separately and are included in Collector's Bundle.
